item.title: Certificate
item.description: This is to certify that John Doe has successfully completed the Certificate and earned English level: Awarded on: 8 Jun 2018 Understanding the results MaltzEnglish SET 1-30 31-40 41-50 51-60 61-70 71-100 CEFR A1 Beginner A2 Elementary B1 Intermediate B2 Upper Intermediate C1 Advanced C2 Proficient MaltzEnglish SET CEFR 1-30 A1 Beginner 31-40 A2 Elementary 41-50 B1 Intermediate 51-60 B2 Upper Intermediate 61-70 C1 Advanced 71-100 C2 Proficient The achieved English level is 45/100 on the MaltzEnglish SET score scale and B1 Intermediate according to the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR).

item.title: FAQ
item.description: About Maltz English General Information What is the Maltz English Standard English Test? The Maltz Online Standard English Test (ME SET) is a free, online English test designed to meet the high technical standards as the other standardized tests in the field, such as the TOEFL or IELTS. With the Maltz Standard English Test, we set out to challenge the status quo – to build a testing solution that not only provides reliable measurement, but is also affordable, simple to use, and always accessible.

item.title: Group plan
item.description: INTENSIVE Plan / three times per week INTENSIVE PLAN Forming study groups is a very effective strategy for enhancing learning. Groups share unique insights and learn from each other. INTENSIVE PLAN Improve your level of English proficiency, three times per week with personal trainer from USA, UK or South Africa. Get started! $168/month (cancel anytime) 25-minute lessons Monthly assessments Easily fits your personal schedule All teachers are native speakers, experienced & certified Homework assigned by your teacher after each lesson Recommended if you want to quickly assess your English skills, both reading and listening.

item.title: Linkedin
item.description: Add to LinkedIn Profile Add your Maltz English Certificate to your LinkedIn Profile With completion of your Maltz English assessment, you will receive a personalized, official English certificate (view example). You can easily add your Certificate URL to your LinkedIn profile - in 3 easy steps! Step 1:Schedule your assessment Step 2: Click on “Add-to-Profile” button from your student account Step 3: Fill out the form!

item.title: Personal trainer plan
item.description: REGULAR Plan / twice a week REGULAR PLAN Improve your level of English proficiency, twice a week with personal trainer from USA or UK. REGULAR PLAN Improve your level of English proficiency, twice a week with personal trainer from USA, UK or South Africa. Get started! $120/month (cancel anytime) 25-minute lessons Monthly assessments Easily fits your personal schedule All teachers are native speakers, experienced & certified Homework assigned by your teacher after each lesson Recommended if you want to quickly assess your English skills, both reading and listening.

item.title: Scratch cards
item.description: Scratch Cards Add your LAL SET Certificate to your LinkedIn Profile With completion of your LAL SET, you will receive a personalized, official English certificate (view example). You can easily add your LAL SET Certificate URL to your LinkedIn profile - in 3 easy steps! Step 1: Take the LAL SET Step 2: Click on “Add-to-Profile” button from the LAL SET Results Page Step 3: Fill out the form!
